Interface BookingSystemFacade

public interface BookingSystemFacade

Define the implementer as an interface for booking system business logic.

Method Detail

findContractors

java.util.Set<Contractor> findContractors(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String location,
                                          boolean matchBoth)
                                          throws FindException
Finds contractors according to name and location.

Parameters:
name - name to match with.
location - location to match with.
matchBoth - if true records returned must match the name and location, otherwise, records must match name or location.
Returns:
list of contractors matching passed criteria.
Throws:
FindException - if finding for contractors is failed.

bookContractor

void bookContractor(Contractor contractor,
                    java.lang.Integer owner)
                    throws BookingException
Perform the logic for booking contractor to an owner.

Parameters:
contractor - contractor to book.
owner - id for the owner to book contractor with.
Throws:
BookingException - if booking is failed or was already booked.
